# Age

## Total

$$\begin{aligned}
\text{average variability} & \sim \text{normal}(\text{real variability},\ \sigma) \\
\text{real variability}  & \sim \text{normal}(\mu,\ \text{sd variability}) \\
\mu & = \alpha + \beta * \text{standardised age} \\
\alpha & \sim \text{normal}(0,\ 0.5) \\
\beta & \sim \text{normal}(0,\ 0.5) \\
\sigma & \sim \text{exponential}(1)
\end{aligned}$$

## Direct

$$\begin{aligned}
\text{average variability} & \sim \text{normal}(\text{real variability},\ \sigma) \\
\text{real variability}  & \sim \text{normal}(\mu,\ \text{sd variability}) \\
\mu & = a_\text{sex}\ + \\
  & \ \ \ \ \ \beta_\text{age} * \text{standardised age}\ + \\
  & \ \ \ \ \ \beta_\text{entry size} * \text{standardised entry size}\ + \\
  & \ \ \ \ \ \beta_\text{degree} * \text{standardised degree}   \\
\alpha_\text{sex} & \sim \text{normal}(\bar{\alpha},\ \sigma_\text{sex}) \\
\bar{\alpha} & \sim \text{normal}(0,\ 0.5) \\
\beta_\text{age}, \beta_\text{entry size}, \beta_\text{degree} & \sim \text{normal}(0,\ 0.5) \\
\sigma & \sim \text{exponential}(1) \\
\sigma_\text{sex} & \sim \text{exponential}(2)
\end{aligned}$$

# Degree

$$\begin{aligned}
\text{average variability} & \sim \text{normal}(\text{real variability},\ \sigma) \\
\text{real variability}  & \sim \text{normal}(\mu,\ \text{sd variability}) \\
\mu & = a_\text{sex}\ + \\
  & \ \ \ \ \ \beta_\text{degree} * \text{standardised degree}\ + \\
  & \ \ \ \ \ \beta_\text{age} * \text{standardised age}\ + \\
  & \ \ \ \ \ \beta_\text{entry size} * \text{standardised entry size}\ + \\
  & \ \ \ \ \ \beta_\text{tree size} * \text{standardised tree size}   \\
\alpha_\text{sex} & \sim \text{normal}(\bar{\alpha},\ \sigma_\text{sex}) \\
\bar{\alpha} & \sim \text{normal}(0,\ 0.5) \\
\beta_\text{degree}, \beta_\text{age}, \beta_\text{entry size}, \beta_\text{tree size} & 
  \sim \text{normal}(0,\ 0.5) \\
\sigma & \sim \text{exponential}(1) \\
\sigma_\text{sex} & \sim \text{exponential}(2)
\end{aligned}$$

$$\begin{aligned}
d_{k}  & \sim \text{normal}(\mu_{k},\ \sigma) \\
\mu_{k} & = a_\text{sex[k]}\ + \\
  & \ \ \ \ \ \beta_\text{degree} * \text{SD}_k\ + \\
  & \ \ \ \ \ \beta_\text{age} * \text{SA}_k\ + \\
  & \ \ \ \ \ \beta_\text{entry size} * \text{SE}_k\ + \\
  & \ \ \ \ \ \beta_\text{tree size} * \text{ST}_k
\end{aligned}$$

# Entry size

## Total

$$\begin{aligned}
\text{average variability} & \sim \text{normal}(\text{real variability},\ \sigma) \\
\text{real variability}  & \sim \text{normal}(\mu,\ \text{sd variability}) \\
\mu & = a_\text{sex}\ + \\
  & \ \ \ \ \ \beta_\text{entry size} * \text{standardised entry size}\ + \\
  & \ \ \ \ \ \beta_\text{age} * \text{standardised age}\\
\alpha_\text{sex} & \sim \text{normal}(\bar{\alpha},\ \sigma_\text{sex}) \\
\bar{\alpha} & \sim \text{normal}(0,\ 0.5) \\
\beta_\text{entry size}, \beta_\text{age} & \sim \text{normal}(0,\ 0.5) \\
\sigma & \sim \text{exponential}(1) \\
\sigma_\text{sex} & \sim \text{exponential}(2)
\end{aligned}$$

## Direct

$$\begin{aligned}
\text{average variability} & \sim \text{normal}(\text{real variability},\ \sigma) \\
\text{real variability}  & \sim \text{normal}(\mu,\ \text{sd variability}) \\
\mu & = a_\text{sex}\ + \\
  & \ \ \ \ \ \beta_\text{entry size} * \text{standardised entry size}\ + \\
  & \ \ \ \ \ \beta_\text{age} * \text{standardised age}\ + \\
  & \ \ \ \ \ \beta_\text{tree size} * \text{standardised tree size}   \\

\bar{\alpha} & \sim \text{normal}(0,\ 0.5) \\
\beta_\text{entry size}, \beta_\text{age}, \beta_\text{tree size} & \sim \text{normal}(0,\ 0.5) \\

\sigma_\text{sex} & \sim \text{exponential}(2)
\end{aligned}$$
